name: Floward For Plants & Flowers Co
description: Operator of an online flower delivery platform intended to deliver a wide range of flowers and gifts. The company's platform offers gifts like flowers, cakes, balloons, and chocolate boxes, according to different occasions like birthdays, anniversaries, and weddings, enabling users to send gifts and express their feelings and wishes to others by gifting them.
one_liner: Operator of an online flower delivery platform intended to deliver a wide range of flowers and gifts. The company's platform offers gifts like flowers, cakes, balloons, and chocolate boxes, according to different occasions like birthdays, anniversaries, and weddings, enabling users to send gifts and express their feelings and wishes to others by gifting them.
